text: Lana Wood (born March 1, 1946) is an American actress and movie producer. She played Plenty O'Toole in the 1971 movie Diamonds are Forever. She played Sandy Webber in the television series Peyton Place. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Santa Monica, California Category:Actresses who played Bond girls
title: Lana Wood
